mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_tb(enterprise_name, password, address, contact, image, email, size, sector, created_at) values(#{enterpriseName}, #{password}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{image}, #{email}, #{size}, #{sector}, now())
mapper.update: update enterprise_tb set enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName}, password=#{password}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, image = #{image}, email = #{email}, size = #{size} where id = #{id}
